description:
Adversaries may abuse PowerShell commands and scripts for execution.
PowerShell is a powerful interactive command-line interface and scripting environment included in the Windows operating system. (Citation: TechNet PowerShell)
Adversaries can use PowerShell to perform a number of actions, including discovery of information and execution of code
author: frack113
name: Powershell XML Execute Command
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:*New\-Object* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*System.Xml.XmlDocument* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.Load* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*IEX\ * OR *Invoke\-Expression\ *))
